titleStmt.title: Numerus infaustus a short view of the unfortunate reigns of William the Second, Henry the Second, Edward the Second, Richard the Second, Charles the Second, James the Second.
titleStmt.author: Caesar, Charles, 1636-1707.

notesStmt.note: Written by Charles Caesar. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
